LanguageData.Antibiotics.label: antibiotics
LanguageData.Antibiotics.description: Antibiotics are used to speed up the recovery time from sickness. Helps prevent infections.
LanguageData.Antibiotics.stages.1.label: boosted immunedefency
LanguageData.DewormHigh.label: de-worm
LanguageData.DewormHigh.description: Drug-induced immunity to certain parasites. This only blocks new parasites; it does nothing for those who are already infected with parasites, even if their parasites are dormant.
LanguageData.FluEzHigh.description: You've taken medicine that helps protect from the flu.
LanguageData.FluEzHigh.label: Flu Ez
LanguageData.IbuprofenHigh.description: You've taken medicine that helps with the pain.
LanguageData.IbuprofenHigh.label: Ibuprofen
LanguageData.IbuprofenHigh.stages.0.label: feeling better
LanguageData.MechaGoneHigh.label: MechaGone
LanguageData.MechaGoneHigh.description: Drug-induced immunity to certain illnesses. This only blocks new infections; it does nothing for those who are already infected, even if their infection is dormant.
LanguageData.Tobacco.label: tobacco
LanguageData.Tobacco.description: Tobacco is grown for drying and smoking. It is also used for trade.
LanguageData.Tobacco.stages.0.label: comfortably numb
LanguageData.Tobacco.stages.1.label: comfortably buzzed
LanguageData.Tobacco.stages.2.label: blackout
LanguageData.TobaccoTolerance.stages.0.label: small
LanguageData.TobaccoTolerance.stages.1.label: small
LanguageData.TobaccoTolerance.stages.2.label: large
LanguageData.TobaccoTolerance.stages.3.label: massive
LanguageData.TobaccoTolerance.label: tobacco tolerance
LanguageData.TobaccoTolerance.description: Because of an tobacco addiction, this person needs to regularly consume more the drug to get that fix.
LanguageData.TobaccoAddiction.label: tobacco addiction
LanguageData.TobaccoAddiction.description: Due to prolonged use of tobacco, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to get that fix.
LanguageData.TobaccoAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
